name: Speed Runner (YoanB)
description:
Speed Runner

is a plateformer prototype where the goal is to finish the level as fast as possible.

This prototype has been made during an OpenGL GameJam organized in one of my video game classes with 4 mates. 

I worked on the Game Design and Level Design.

Our game is playable with a keyboard, but we recommend playing with a controller. As for the controls (the controller controls are available in game):

- Directional arrows to move 

- Shift to sprint 

- Space to jump (You can jump again in the air) 

- R to restart 

- Q to leave 

- To perform a wall jump, you must be stuck to a wall and jump in the opposite direction to the wall pressed.
